alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 21 at 5:47AM PDT until September 21 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will tend to be most dense along the Long Beach Peninsula, near the Columbia River, and in the Tillamook Valley. Visibility is highly variable along Highway 101.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
